QuestData.Title: Supplies Needed: Amber Grease
QuestData.Description: Foreman,$b$bOur supply of gris is running low. You know as well as I do that there is no end to Glitterfall Basin's need of it.$b$bI've overheard from some of the other workers that you have a bit of a gorm problem. But the bigger the gorm, the bigger the gris, right?$b$bIf you happen to harvest some more, we can certainly put it to good use.$b$b<The work order is signed: "Cavina.">
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver the Giant Gorm Gris to Gormsmith Cavina.
QuestData.RewardText: It really is a remarkable substance. We use it in practically everything! Construction, mending, crafts, and it can even be added to rations.
